name: simplehelpers.net
description: Micro-libraries for .Net that are safe and simple to use.
author: Khalid Salom√£o (https://github.com/khalidsalomao)

scripts.test:docs: start mkdocs serve & watch -p "{*,docs/**/*}.md" -c "npm run build:docs"
scripts.build:docs: rd mkdocs_site\ /s /q & md mkdocs_site & COPY README.md mkdocs_site\index.md /y & XCOPY docs\* mkdocs_site\docs\ /y /i
